name: ActiveDot
0:
”Alexa, open active dot.”
”Alexa, ask active dot to search for cycling events”
”Alexa, ask active dot to search for basketball”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: active dot
des: As an entry of Active.com, Active Dot provide convenient way to search events/activities near you. You could find many kinds of activities, such as camps, endurance, half marathon, fitness, cycling, basketball etc. And once you got any interested events, on your demand, we could send invitation email to provide you the event enroll entry.
